nodes.text: "Permission Denied" was a song by the band Red Shift Limit. The track was featured on the compilation album Thoughts from the Core, preceded in the track list by a song titled "Permission to Think." The album that the song appeared on was in circulation in the galaxy by the period of time between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY. Due to Red Shift Limit being an anti-Imperial musical group, the song was banned by the Imperial Board of Culture.

"Permission Denied" was first mentioned in the 1993 book Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann.
